nodes.title: How To Use
widgets_values:
## Z-Image -> Optional Qwen Edit -> LTX-2 I2V (Best-Practice Setup)

Use this as a 3-stage pipeline:
1. Build a strong keyframe (identity + composition) in Z-Image.
2. Apply Qwen Edit only for targeted changes (wardrobe/props/lighting), not full restyling.
3. Use LTX prompt for motion/camera over time while preserving identity.

Switches:
- **Use Uploaded Keyframe?** false=Z-Image output, true=uploaded image
- **Apply Qwen Edit?** false=skip edit, true=apply edit

Key rule: keep subject description consistent across all three prompts to reduce drift.

nodes.title: Keyframe Prompt (Z-Image)
widgets_values: [Close-up cinematic portrait] of a woman with freckles and auburn curls in a 1950s diner near a rain-streaked window at blue hour. She wears a cream blouse and deep emerald cardigan with small pearl earrings. Warm tungsten practicals on face, cool neon rim light from window side, natural skin texture, sharp eyes, shallow depth of field, 50mm lens look, filmic color, high detail. No text, no watermark, no deformed hands.

Keep same person identity, face shape, hairstyle, skin tone, camera angle, and diner composition. Change only: (1) cardigan color from emerald to burgundy velvet, (2) add a small chrome microphone on the table foreground, (3) slightly increase window rain bokeh reflections. Do not alter age, ethnicity, facial structure, or background layout.

0-1s: subject breathes naturally, one gentle blink, slight chin lift. 1-3s: slow 8% camera push-in, maintain focus on eyes while background neon softly blooms. 3-5s: subtle glance to the right, then return gaze to lens with faint smile. 5-8s: hold framing, natural shoulder micro-motion, stable identity and hairstyle, no morphing. Cinematic realism, coherent lighting, no scene changes, no extra limbs, no face distortion.

nodes.title: Scene Intent (Prefill Box)
widgets_values:
SUBJECT: [person/character + age range + key facial traits]
SETTING: [location + era + weather/time]
LOOK: [wardrobe + props + color palette]
CAMERA: [lens feeling + framing + movement intent]
MOOD: [emotional tone + pacing]
CONSISTENCY LOCK: [what must NOT change across frames]

nodes.title: Prompt Strategy
widgets_values:
### Prompt Strategy
- **Z-Image prompt**: static visual truth (identity, wardrobe, lighting, framing).
- **Qwen Edit prompt**: only deltas (small controlled edits), include `do not change` clauses.
- **LTX prompt**: time-ordered motion and camera instructions, plus identity lock.
- Keep names, age, hairstyle, outfit, and scene anchors consistent across prompts.
Latina female with thick wavy hair, harbor boats and pastel houses behind. Breezy seaside light, warm tones, cinematic close-up.

nodes.title: KSampler settings
widgets_values:
You can test and find the best setting by yourself. The following table is for reference.
|   | Qwen | Comfy | lightning LoRA |
|--------|---------|------------|---------------------------|
| Steps  | 40      | 20         | 4                         |
| CFG    | 4.0     | 4.0       | 1.0                       |

By default, we use 20 steps as we just don't want it to take too long. Try 40 if you want a better result, but it will take longer.
The "Edit Model Reference Method" nodes above are not needed if you use Comfy files, but may be needed if you use repackaged ones from other people.

nodes.title: TextEncodeQwenImageEditPlus (Positive)
widgets_values: Change the furniture leather difference in image 1 to the fur material in image 2.
blurry, low quality, still frame, frames, watermark, overlay, titles, has blurbox, has subtitles

A close-up shot of a young waitress in a retro 1950s diner, her warm brown eyes meeting the camera with a gentle smile. She wears a black polka-dot dress with an elegant cream lace collar, her reddish-brown hair styled in an elaborate updo with delicate curls framing her freckled face. Soft, warm light from overhead fixtures illuminates her features as she stands behind a yellow counter. The camera begins slightly to her side, then slowly pushes in toward her face, revealing the subtle rosy blush on her cheeks. In the blurred background, the soft teal walls and a glowing red "Diner" sign create a nostalgic atmosphere. The ambient sounds of clinking dishes, distant conversations, and the gentle hum of a jukebox fill the air. She tilts her head slightly and says in a friendly, warm voice: "Welcome to Rosie's. What can I get for you today?" The mood is inviting, timeless, and full of classic American diner charm.

nodes.title: LoRA
widgets_values:
# Using LoRAs
**Ctrl + B to enable**

For the camera LoRA we recommend setting strength = 1

You can use LTX [Ready to use camera LoRAs](https://huggingface.co/collections/Lightricks/ltx-2)




Use a second LoRa only when the details are important in the LoRa. 

## Training
We have made available a full trainer to help you to train your own LoRA. You can [find it here](https://github.com/Lightricks/LTX-2).
